name: Reverse Curl
setup: Stand tall with feet hip-width, shoulders relaxed
Hold dumbbells (or bar) with overhand (pronated) grip, hands about shoulder-width
Elbows stay close to torso, wrists neutral (no excessive extension)
steps: Inhale; brace lightly while keeping ribs stacked
Curl the weight by flexing at the elbows—avoid swinging shoulders
Stop just before elbows drift forward; squeeze briefly
Lower under control (2–3 sec) to full extension without locking hard
safety: Use a lighter load than standard curl; overhand grip stresses forearms more. If wrist discomfort, use EZ bar or lighten weight.

prescriptionHints.notes: Forearm/brachialis focus; prioritize clean wrist position.

joints.notes: Keep wrists neutral; avoid excessive grip squeeze if elbows irritated.
